contextId.information: Here the word "head" refers to the person. The revenge that they wanted to exact towards Yahweh, he will make happen to them. AT: "I will cause you to suffer the revenge that you tried to put on me" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
contextId.quote: I will immediately return your retribution on your own head
